Package me.efekos.simpler.events

Class ItemEvents

java.lang.Object
me.efekos.simpler.events.ItemEvents
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public class ItemEvents extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Should be registered as one of your plugin's listeners so CustomItems can work. You don't have to register them yourself. Setting up the ItemManager by ItemManager.setPlugin(JavaPlugin) also registers this listener to your plugin.
